content.question:
The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The y axis ranges from negative 3 to 4 in increments of 1.

The tail of the vector is at (2 comma negative 1), and the head is at (negative 1 comma 2).

The vector <math alttext="vector v"><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> is shown in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. Which of the following gives <math alttext="vector v"><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> as components?

choices.label: <math alttext="open angle brackets negative 3 comma 3 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 3 comma negative 3 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets negative 1 comma 2 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 2 comma negative 1 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angle brackets negative 3 comma 3 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
